show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: BAM!  The fed’s billion dollar Brain Activity Mapping project.  Neuroscience at its best? <!--more--> Listen to my highly informed guest Jon Rappoport as we talk about psychiatry in the service of social control.   The political left and right are turning to psychiatry as means for controlling violence.  Listen, learn and then link to my latest blog, “Never Again!” http://www.naturalnews.com/039560psychiatryrealhistoryschool_shootings.html
